1.vic: To prove his mental strenght Chuck Norris listened to Metallica/Lou Reed-collaboration "Lulu" on repeat for a whole day.

2.vic: When Chuck Norris watches, the paint dries instantly.

3.vic: When Bruce Banner gets mad, he tuns into Hulk. When Hulk gets mad, he turns into Chuck Norris, when Chuck Norris gets mad, RUN LIKE HELL!!!!!!!!!!!!!

4.vic: Chuck Norris doesn't give you the willies. He simply gives you The Willy.

5.vic: When Chuck Norris says, 'this is the line. Don't walk across it', he just created a new international border.

6.vic: Chuck Norris can squeeze orange juice out of a banana.

7.vic: Little Johnny's teacher asked him to describe Chuck Norris. Little Johnny said Chuck Norris is like a wheelbarrow full of awesome.

10.vic: Chuck Norris can quitely sneak up on himself

11.vic: Chuck Norris is the reason why bats can't see cause they took one look at him and they went blind.

12.vic: Chuck Norris just look at him..

14.vic: If Chuck Norris was a twilight vampire, he wouldn't sparkle, he'd blind you for life b/c nobody will ever see Chuck Norris as such a travisty

15.vic: Chuck Norris wears a full samurai suit as pajamas.

16.vic: Chuck Norris can sky dive from the ground into the plane.

17.vic: Chuck Norris never reads a book. The book reads for Chuck Norris.

20.vic: Chuck Norris is the undisputed lord and master of trampoline sex.

22.vic: Chuck Norris doesn't eat vegetables, because they don't beg for mercy.

23.vic: If suddenly the world was taken over by aliens...everyone would be made their slaves and Chuck Norris would be made their king, no questions asked.
